title: HELP!! can't buy RP
body:
For some reason it says that can't buy RP in 24h, iv'e been waiting for 2 days even and it still dosen't work, please help i need my RP!! 



PS. i've been trying to turn my computer off and on but that dosen't work either

replies.body:
First, be sure there are 24+ hours between your attempts at trying. Each attempt resets the clock. If you're still having issues after waiting 24 hours before another attempt, please reach out to our billing specialists in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
